<NEW>

WHEELIE could not sa=
y what had happened to the legendary OPTIMUS PRIME.  Whether he had retired=
, whether he had been exiled, whether he had become one with the Matrix, ro=
 gone off throughout space in search of Decepticons still seeking to harm o=
thers.  All he could say was that Cybertronian society had rapidly turned i=
n the same directions it had at the end of the previous war.

Finally shaki=
ng his head, WHEELIE said, "You are in no shape to go.  That I can say, tha=
t I do know.  If you honestly think that we must find out, Iw ill leave and=

I will go loko for the DINOBOTS.  You should join the Maximals and their ta=
lks.  Out of here you should be ready, for in a fight you cannot remain ste=
